alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Hooker; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 4:14PM CDT until June 07 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Hooker County in west central Nebraska... Western Thomas County in north central Nebraska... * Until 545 PM CDT/445 PM MDT/. * At 413 PM CDT/313 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles north of Whitman, or 27 miles northwest of Mullen, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mullen, Thedford, Seneca, Speckel Meir Lake, Norway, Highway 97 crossing the Dismal River, Hire, Giant Hill, Sevenmile Hill, Hecla, Kelso, Weir and Shimmons Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 165 and 213. Highway 97 between mile markers 45 and 84. Highway 83 between mile markers 145 and 161. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
